parameters.name: hkl
parameters.description: Input locale identifier to be activated.

parameters.name: Flags
parameters.description: Specifies how the input locale identifier is to be activated. This parameter can be one of the following values.

parameters.name: hwnd
parameters.description: A handle to the window to be placed in the clipboard format listener list.

parameters.name: lpRect
parameters.description: A pointer to a RECT structure that contains the coordinates of the top-left and bottom-right corners of the desired client area. When the function returns, the structure contains the coordinates of the top-left and bottom-right corners of the window to accommodate the desired client area.

parameters.name: dwStyle
parameters.description: The window style of the window whose required size is to be calculated. Note that you cannot specify the WS_OVERLAPPED style.

parameters.name: bMenu
parameters.description: Indicates whether the window has a menu.

parameters.name: lpRect
parameters.description: A pointer to a RECT structure that contains the coordinates of the top-left and bottom-right corners of the desired client area. When the function returns, the structure contains the coordinates of the top-left and bottom-right corners of the window to accommodate the desired client area.

parameters.name: dwStyle
parameters.description: The window style of the window whose required size is to be calculated. Note that you cannot specify the WS_OVERLAPPED style.

parameters.name: bMenu
parameters.description: Indicates whether the window has a menu.

parameters.name: dwExStyle
parameters.description: The extended window style of the window whose required size is to be calculated.

functions.return_type: If the function succeeds, the return value is nonzero.
functions.name: AdjustWindowRectExForDpi

parameters.name: lpRect
parameters.type: A pointer to a RECT structure that contains the coordinates of the top-left and bottom-right corners of the desired client area. When the function returns, the structure contains the coordinates of the top-left and bottom-right corners of the window to accommodate the desired client area.
parameters.description: dwStyle

parameters.name: bMenu
parameters.type: Indicates whether the window has a menu.
parameters.description: dwExStyle

parameters.name: dpi
parameters.type: The DPI to use for scaling.
parameters.description: If the function succeeds, the return value is nonzero.

parameters.name: dwProcessId
parameters.description: The identifier of the process that will be enabled to set the foreground window. If this parameter is ASFW_ANY, all processes will be enabled to set the foreground window.

parameters.name: hWnd
parameters.description: A handle to the window to animate. The calling thread must own this window.

parameters.name: dwTime
parameters.description: The time it takes to play the animation, in milliseconds. Typically, an animation takes 200 milliseconds to play.

parameters.name: dwFlags
parameters.description: The type of animation. This parameter can be one or more of the following values. Note that, by default, these flags take effect when showing a window. To take effect when hiding a window, use AW_HIDE and a logical OR operator with the appropriate flags.

parameters.name: hMenu
parameters.description: A handle to the menu bar, drop-down menu, submenu, or shortcut menu to be changed.

parameters.name: uFlags
parameters.description: Controls the appearance and behavior of the new menu item. This parameter can be a combination of the following values.

parameters.name: uIDNewItem
parameters.description: The identifier of the new menu item or, if the uFlags parameter is set to MF_POPUP, a handle to the drop-down menu or submenu.

parameters.name: lpNewItem
parameters.description: The content of the new menu item. The interpretation of lpNewItem depends on whether the uFlags parameter includes the following values.
